sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1129
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 176
Requirement is not verified NVM block shall be configured as below, allowing CDL to store:
- the CDL-state(port NV_ZV_Zustand, 7 bytes) - the CDLcrash-state(port NV_ZV_Crash, 1 byte) - the CDL-history (port NV_ZV_Historie, 141 bytes) - the CDL-HistorieEntr (port NV_ZV_HistorieEntr, 161 bytes) - the CDL-HistorieErweitert (port NV_ZV_HistorieErweitert, 19 bytes) - the CDL Monitor (port NV_ZV_Monitor, 20 bytes)
Note1: Values for the ports are different than stated in the STR requirement, actual values and presented in this SW requirement re taken from SST as agreed with VW (GATEWAY-5590) Note2: The SW-component CDL requires three blocks in the non-volatile memory, according to the definition in the ARXML-file
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1129 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.para:

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20015
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/inc/ZV_Task.h line 132 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Task.c.test line 150 The cyclic call shall be implemented in the following order by the SWC supplier: 1. cyclic_zv 2. cyclic_kft 3. cyclic_dwa 4. cyclic_qtg (optional) 5. cyclic_cpd
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_20015 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9768
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/inc/ZV_Task.h line 132 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Task.c.test line 150 In the RUN mode, the SW of the supplier shall execute the cyclic runnables with a cycle time of 10ms for the runnables specified in SWR_ICAS1_GW_9769 and SWR_ICAS1_GW_20015. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9768 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9770
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/inc/ZV_Task.h line 132 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZV/Evo/test/swut/ZV_Task.c.test line 150 the cyclic call shall be called strictly one after the other and the platform chorus shall ensure that the shared input data does not change during the call cycle. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9770 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM
